pages.text: $(li)Melon Seeds can be plant in Farmland to generate a Melon.$(br)$(li)They can be crafted placing a Melon Slice in a Crafting Table.

$(li)Melon Seeds can be used to tame Parrots.$(br)$(li)You can use Melon Seeds to craft a Seed Pouch in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)Finally you can put Melon Seeds in a Composter to generate Bone Meal.
